summary: In this video, Gabe Poirot explores the upcoming solar eclipse's potential significance, linking it to historical events, biblical prophecies, and a call to faith.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a person sitting on a couch, speaking into a microphone, wearing a black shirt with white text. The background features a checkered blanket and pillows. Text appears on the screen, stating 'unlike anything we have EVER seen before...' and 'THE MOST SPECTACULAR MOMENTS.' The scene transitions to a black screen with a red eclipse graphic and the text '2024 SOLAR ECLIPSE APRIL 8, 2024.' A map of the United States follows, highlighting the path of the eclipse and showing cities with varying eclipse percentages. The person reappears, with text listing topics to be covered: 'What's to come: where, when, how to get ready, how to see it, Could God be speaking?' The video then shows a map with the path of the eclipse and times for different cities, followed by a historical painting of soldiers with the text '1865... end of civil war, same solar eclipse?' The final frame shows a map with a question mark and the text 'where the last soldier was buried?' The video combines informative content about the 2024 solar eclipse with historical context and questions, creating an engaging narrative.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a male speaker with an enthusiastic tone emphasizing the significance of an upcoming event. He introduces the topic of a solar eclipse on April 8th, encouraging listeners to "buckle up." He promises to reveal details that may change perceptions of the event and references the year 1865 as relevant to the path of the eclipse entering the United States. Then, the audio abruptly cuts off.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a person sitting on a couch, speaking into a microphone, wearing a black shirt with white text. The background includes a checkered blanket and pillows. The scene transitions to a map highlighting the path of a solar eclipse across the United States, with cities like Denver, Dallas, and Houston marked, and percentages indicating the eclipse's visibility in different areas. Text overlays explain the eclipse's path and visibility percentages. The video then shows an animated depiction of the Earth, Sun, and Moon, with text stating, "The Moon is 400 times smaller than the Sun," illustrating the astronomical phenomenon. The person continues speaking, gesturing with their hands, and the video concludes with a return to the initial setting, maintaining the same background and attire.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a single male speaker excitedly discussing an upcoming location and its possible significance. He then describes what the listener is currently seeing as the path of a total eclipse and the percentage visible at varying distances. The speaker notes the importance of avoiding direct eye contact with the eclipse, marveling at the moon's size and distance relative to the sun, creating a perfect alignment. An ominous, low-frequency rumble rises to a crescendo at the end.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a person sitting on a couch, wearing a black t-shirt with white text, speaking into a microphone. The background includes a checkered blanket and a plain wall. The scene transitions to a map of the United States, highlighting locations named Nineveh with text stating, 'How many places in America are called Nineveh? There are 7 places named Nineveh in America.' The map zooms in on Ohio and Indiana, showing specific locations with blue pins and the text 'IF YOU ZOOM IN ON OHIO AND INDIANA.' The video then returns to the person on the couch, who continues speaking and gesturing. Another map appears, showing the general vicinity of a full eclipse with the text 'ARE WITHIN THE GENERAL VICINITY OF THIS FULL ECLIPSE.' The person continues to speak, and the video transitions to a biblical passage from Matthew 12:39-41, with an image of a person riding a whale. The passage reads, 'But Jesus replied, "Only an evil, adulterous generation would demand a miraculous sign; but the only sign I will give them is the sign of the prophet Jonah. For as Jonah was in the belly of the great fish for three days and three nights, so will the Son of Man be in the heart of the earth for three days and three nights. The people of Nineveh will stand.' The video concludes with the person on the couch, continuing to speak into the microphone.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip features two distinct male speakers discussing a full solar eclipse. The first speaker highlights that the last full eclipse was in 2017 and mentions cities that the eclipse is going through, including the town of "Nineveh." The second speaker suggests this is a coincidence, noting many towns are named Nineveh, but the first speaker then counters by stating there are only seven towns named Nineveh in America, and all of them are in the general vicinity of the eclipse, with two directly in line. They then quote Matthew 12:39 and discuss the sign of the prophet Jonah. The speaker concludes this point and indicates the possibility of dismissing it. Suddenly, there is a boing noise, indicating the ending of the clip.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a person sitting on a couch, wearing a black shirt, speaking into a microphone. The background includes a checkered blanket and a plain wall. The scene transitions to a map of the United States, highlighting a path from the west to the east coast with markers for the years 2017 and 2024. The map zooms in on the central part of the country, focusing on cities like Omaha, Kansas City, and Oklahoma City. The person continues speaking, with a graphic of a Hebrew letter 'tav' appearing in the top right corner, accompanied by the text 'Hebrew letter tav at the time of Ezekiel (Pure Hebrews).' The video then shows a close-up of the Hebrew letter 'tav' with the text 'I am the Alpha and the Omega, the Beginning and the End, the First and the Last. Blessed are those who do His commandments, that they may have the right to the tree of life, and may enter through the gates into the city' from Revelation 22:13-14. The map reappears, now with the path marked by an 'X' symbol. The person continues to speak, gesturing with their hands, while the map and text remain visible on the screen.
events_list.audio_caption: A male speaker begins by describing an interesting astronomical phenomenon involving the 2017 and 2024 eclipses, mentioning that they create a criss-cross marking the nation. He then continues by pointing out the similarity of this shape to the letter "Tav" in the Hebrew alphabet, adding that including another eclipse from 2023, they form the letter "Alef". His tone is inquisitive and intrigued.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a person is seen sitting in front of a microphone, wearing a black sweatshirt with the text "HEAVEN TO EARTH" printed on it. The individual appears to be speaking or presenting, as indicated by their hand gestures and facial expressions. The background features a checkered blanket draped over a couch, adding a cozy atmosphere to the setting. To the right of the person, there are two images displayed on the screen. The top image shows a parchment-like background with the Greek letters Alpha (Α) and Omega (Ω) crossed out, accompanied by a biblical quote from Revelation 22:13, which reads, "I am the Alpha and the Omega, the Beginning and the End, the First and the Last. Blessed are those who do His commandments, that they may have the right to the tree of life, and may enter through the gates into the city." The bottom image is a map of the United States with several areas marked by red lines, possibly indicating specific regions or boundaries. Throughout the video, the person continues to speak, occasionally gesturing with their hands, while the background and images remain consistent, providing a visual context to the discussion.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a male speaker suggesting the first and last letters of the Hebrew alphabet are being shaped across the nation by an upcoming solar eclipse. He speculates on whether "the one who is the beginning and the end, the Alpha and Omega," might be using "the signs in the sky to speak to us." He then suggests going back to Jonah. The overall tone is inquisitive and slightly dramatic.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a young man with short, styled hair, wearing a black t-shirt with white text, seated on a beige couch with a brown and white checkered blanket in the background. He speaks into a microphone, gesturing with his hands as he discusses a historical event. The scene transitions to a map highlighting a path across Europe, Asia, and Africa, with text stating 'THERE WAS A SOLAR ECLIPSE' and 'BEEN DOCUMENTED AS THE ASSYRIAN ECLIPSE.' The man continues to speak, with subtitles displaying 'BEEN DOCUMENTED AS THE ASSYRIAN ECLIPSE.' The video then shows a close-up of a text passage from the Bible, detailing a conversation between the LORD and Moses, with the man gesturing as he reads. The final scene displays another Bible passage in red text, discussing the unknown timing of certain events, with the man continuing to speak and gesture, emphasizing his points. The video maintains a consistent setting with a neutral background, focusing on the man's discussion and the historical and biblical context he presents.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a male speaker sharing the interesting fact that the day Jonah walked into Nineveh, there was a solar eclipse, documented as the Assyrian eclipse. He transitions to quoting from Exodus, highlighting the importance of believing a second sign if the first isn't heeded. The tone is conversational and curious. The speaker then indicates a shift to another potentially revealing situation.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a person wearing a black shirt, speaking into a microphone while seated on a couch with a checkered blanket in the background. The individual appears to be discussing biblical texts, as indicated by the text overlay on the left side of the screen, which includes verses from the Bible. The person gestures with their hands while speaking, emphasizing their points. The video transitions to a map with text overlays, discussing the appearance of cicadas and their connection to a solar eclipse. The map highlights specific locations, including Makanda and Giant City State Park, with an inset image of a house. The person continues to speak, maintaining a consistent background and setting throughout the video.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a male speaker discussing Matthew 24, mentioning the return of the Son of Man being likened to Noah's day and referencing Genesis 6:4, where "giant Nephilites lived on the Earth." The speaker expresses surprise that few look into the appearance of cicadas and its path in the solar eclipse, then mentions a State Park called Giant City State Park, implying it is similar to the time of Noah. The speaker sounds somewhat rhetorical asking if we are living in the exact days of Noah.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a person sitting on a couch, wearing a black sweatshirt, speaking into a microphone. The background includes a checkered blanket and a beige pillow. The person gestures with their hands while talking. A black-and-white photograph of a man with a beard appears on the left side of the screen. The scene transitions to a map of the United States with a green line and a question mark, indicating a path or route. The text 'Entrance 2024' is visible on the map. The video then shows a group of people, including a man in a wheelchair, standing in front of military vehicles, with microphones in front of them. The text 'AND IT'S BEEN ON THE MIND OF EVEN THE STATES' appears at the bottom of the screen. The video concludes with the group of people still standing in front of the military vehicles, with the text 'AND IT'S BEEN ON THE MIND OF EVEN THE STATES' remaining on the screen.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a male speaker discussing a complex topic involving artificial intelligence, DNA intermingling, and changing definitions of human identity, with an opinionated tone. He brings up the days of Noah and the year 2024, and mentions a Confederate soldier buried in Shelby Park, noting that a solar eclipse path passes through a city. The speaker discusses border crossings and the relationship between states and the federal government. He ends with a disclaimer addressing YouTube, clarifying that he is not promoting hate or violence, speaking with a slightly defensive tone.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a young man wearing a black sweatshirt with the text "HOME TO EARTH" is seated on a couch with a brown and white checkered blanket in the background. He speaks into a microphone, gesturing with his hands as he talks. The scene transitions to a starry night sky with the text "THAT CANNOT JUST BE DISCOUNTED" appearing on the screen, emphasizing the importance of the subject being discussed. The video then returns to the young man, who continues to speak and gesture, with the text "Donation link in description I call partners and pray with you!" appearing at the top of the screen, indicating a call to action for viewers to support the content creator. The video maintains a consistent setting with the young man as the focal point, engaging the audience with his speech and gestures.
events_list.audio_caption: A male speaker begins with a quick disclaimer, emphasizing the video's content is not violating community guidelines, before transitioning into a discussion about eclipses coinciding with the Civil War. He pauses to express gratitude to channel supporters, mentioning content creation reaching millions and charitable activities for single moms and families. This segment includes descriptions about financial support for this ministry and its 501c3 nonprofit status. The recording then abruptly ends.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a young man with short brown hair is seated on a beige couch, wearing a black t-shirt with white text that reads "HEARTBREAKER." He is speaking into a black microphone mounted on a stand in front of him. The background features a brown and white checkered blanket draped over the couch and a beige pillow. The man uses expressive hand gestures to emphasize his points, occasionally pointing to himself and the microphone. The lighting is soft and even, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. Throughout the video, the man maintains a relaxed posture, occasionally adjusting his position slightly. The text "THAT IT'S ALL NOT LOST" appears on the screen, suggesting a theme of hope or resilience in his speech. The overall setting is cozy and intimate, with the man appearing engaged and passionate about the topic he is discussing.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a male speaker sharing his thoughts on an upcoming solar eclipse, stating, "it's definitely not a good sign to America." He expresses the belief that it's not God's approval and emphasizes that people have a choice to change their course. The speaker has a measured and thoughtful tone. The audio transitions to soft, uplifting background music, featuring piano melodies, creating a reflective mood as the male speaker continues talking about God using the sun, moon, and stars "to speak to us". He then encourages people to "run back into his presence," stating "God is not looking for some snowflake fans". The clip ends with the speaker declaring "but he wants his sons and daughters to rise and take a stand."

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a young man wearing a black shirt is seated on a couch with a brown and white checkered blanket draped over the back. He is speaking into a microphone, gesturing with his hands as he talks. The background is a plain wall, and the atmosphere is casual and relaxed. The man appears to be engaged in a conversation or delivering a message, as indicated by his expressive hand movements and facial expressions. The text on the screen reads, "AND TAKE A STAND YOU DON'T NEED TO BE AFRAID," suggesting that the man is discussing the importance of taking a stand and not being afraid to do so. The overall setting and the man's demeanor convey a sense of encouragement and motivation.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker, delivering an encouraging message with a calm, reassuring tone. He mentions not needing to be afraid, an upcoming "Goshen", abiding in presence, coming out greater, humility, fighting for the listener, not being ashamed or afraid, and rising to take the mountain. He further adds many people in the listener's life have spoken against or torn them down, but "This is my son, this is my daughter", speaking on Father’s behalf. He describes the listeners as “sent one” wrapped in God's arms. The clip concludes with speech.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a young man is seated on a couch, wearing a black sweatshirt with the letters "HF" visible on the front. He is positioned in front of a microphone, suggesting he is recording or speaking. The background features a checkered blanket draped over the couch, adding a cozy atmosphere to the setting. The man appears to be engaged in a conversation or presentation, as indicated by his hand gestures and facial expressions. The lighting is soft and even, highlighting the subject and creating a warm, inviting environment. Throughout the video, the man's expressions and gestures change slightly, indicating the flow of his speech or discussion. The overall scene conveys a sense of casual professionalism, with the man likely discussing a topic of interest or sharing information in a relaxed yet focused manner.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker encouraging listeners to "receive the love of God today," and to "receive his presence even now." His tone is encouraging and somewhat preaching. He urges listeners to set aside distractions and things that seem important, emphasizing that seeking God is most important, because "he's already sought after you." He states that God believed in and chose the listener, and then sacrificed his life for them. His voice fades out. A short, low-frequency sound effect marks the end.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a young man with short brown hair is seated on a beige couch, wearing a black sweatshirt with the text "HEAVY" visible on the front. He is speaking into a black microphone mounted on a stand, suggesting he is recording a podcast or vlog. The background features a checkered brown and white blanket draped over the couch, along with a beige pillow. The man gestures with his hands as he speaks, indicating he is engaged in a conversation or presentation. At one point, text appears on the screen that reads "CLICK HERE TO WATCH" with an arrow pointing upwards, encouraging viewers to watch another video. The setting is a simple, indoor environment with a neutral-colored wall, creating a casual and relaxed atmosphere. The man's expressions and gestures suggest he is enthusiastic and animated in his delivery.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker saying, "You." He transitions to an informative tone, mentioning signs, and that a person can ask God themselves. He speaks about Jesus paying the price. The speaker then mentions a 90-day devotional and urges the listener to check the description. The tone changes again as he references Joe Rogan and Aaron Rodgers talking about similar themes, such as Nephilim, Giants, and spiritual creatures, suggesting there is a video of him reacting to them. He ends by telling the listener they will miss the full episode if they don't click.
